entries.description: Heartbeat: Checked YouTube dashboard - MVP complete, all phases done except Twitter/X integration (blocked). Dashboard live at youtube.agentassisting.com
Implemented Kanban UI improvements: (1) Notes now span full card width instead of being constrained by flex row, (2) Added collapse/expand all button to hide/show notes across all cards
UX overhaul: Redesigned kanban task cards with cleaner minimal design - removed cluttered buttons, simplified layout, better text handling
Heartbeat: Infrastructure healthy, GitHub synced - no pending tasks
Daily briefing generated and sent to Slack. Covered 14 new emails and 3 Jira tickets.
